description: Creates a backup of the API Management service to the given Azure Storage Account. This is long running operation and could take several minutes to complete.

service_name.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the ApiManagementService_Backup operation.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

storageaccount.description: Azure Cloud Storage account (used to place/retrieve the backup) name.

accesskey.description: Azure Cloud Storage account (used to place/retrieve the backup) access key.

containername.description: Azure Cloud Storage blob container name used to place/retrieve the backup.

backupname.description: The name of the backup file to create.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

api_version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.
